original_text: And the servant who was in charge of the reapers answered, “She is the young Moabite woman, who came back with Naomi from the country of Moab.
korean_text: 베는 자를 거느린 사환이 대답하여 이르되 이는 나오미와 함께 모압 지방에서 돌아온 모압 소녀인데

sentences.original_text: And the servant who was in charge of the reapers answered
She is the young Moabite woman
who came back with Naomi from the country of Moab.
sentences.korean_translation: 나오미와 함께 모압 땅에서 돌아온 사람입니다.
